A textbook example of a "short but sweet" gaming experience. Excellent level designs, humorous banter from an evil AI that tempts you with cake, and pleasantly accessible. One of the best puzzle games ever made.

i haven't played through the whole game yet, but this game is one of my favorites.

1. portals are awesome.

3. PORTALS. ARE. AWESOME!

Wow. This game may be short but sure is good. There are tons of cool easter eggs and the game is overall very interesting. It actually makes your brain think (a lot lol). It has a very eerie tone to it, which I think makes it better. 100% worth the money (but if u can buy the portal pack instead - comes with both games and has 25% off)

While Portal 2 is overall a better game, this game was way ahead of it's time. The mechanics and design is so creative with puzzle design seen nowhere else in the gaming world. Totally pick this up, it's worth your time.
This is an essential title for anyone who plays games. It's a classic. Not much can be said that hasn't already been said.
Sehr cooles Spiel macht sehr viel Spaß! ;D

Portal is so much fun! I have never been one to play puzzle games, but I really enjoyed the environment and design of this game. The puzzles were fun and did get a little more challenging towards the end, and I really just loved the concept of the portal gun overall. I enjoyed the sort of slow reveal of the darker themes and story line as you progressed through the levels as well. 
I think it'll be fun to play through the extended levels that are available too, now that I've finished the main game. Overall, the game is fun and the story is engaging. I'm really glad I decided to try it out as one of my first puzzle based games!
What an amazing game! Compelling story, fun challenges and mechanics! Valve truly outdid themselves with this one! I received it from the Christmas sale and enjoyed it so much! Thanks Valve!
If you want a puzzle game that has little play time than this is the game for you, the puzzles are very short and simple and the story is pretty intriguing.
excellent experience of a game. the atmosphere is brilliant. short and sweet. PLAY THIS BEFORE PORTAL 2.
Very good. maybe a bit short but worth the price =)

The first in the series, seriously fun to play, no co-op mode, that came with Portal 2, as well as the workshop, also in Portal 2, but very fun to play, and should be played first, before playing Portal 2.
